outputs.output_descr: Provision of livelihoods and economic recovery (DDR, livelihoods and mine action) technical and programme design and advisory services to Country Offices

outputs.output_descr: Project 00059429 is approved for 2011 as well. The project is hereby extended from 01/01/2011 - 31/12/2011
As per 2010 work plan for ERT the project title for this project is change from "ER Liveli. reint. & governance"
